alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 10:01AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Searcy, northeastern Newton and southeastern Boone Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 1001 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jasper, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper... Western Grove... Dugger... Eula... Piercetown... Carver... Pruitt... Point Peter... Everton... Pindall... Bass... Wayton... Yardelle... Parthenon... Vendor... Gum Springs in Newton County... Mt Judea... Snowball... Hasty... Woolum Recreation Area... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
